How to optimize SQL queries for large datasets?
body:
I have a database table with over 1 million records and my queries are becoming very slow. Here's an example query that takes too long:

```sql
SELECT u.name, p.title, p.created_at 
FROM users u 
JOIN posts p ON u.id = p.user_id 
WHERE p.created_at > '2023-01-01' 
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC;
```

What are some strategies to improve performance?

title: Docker container keeps exiting with code 0
body:
I'm trying to run a Node.js application in Docker but the container keeps exiting immediately with exit code 0. Here's my Dockerfile:

```dockerfile
FROM node:16-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
EXPOSE 3000
CMD ["npm", "start"]
```

The application works fine locally. What could be causing this issue?

title: Python list comprehension vs map() performance
body:
I'm wondering about the performance difference between list comprehensions and map() in Python. Which one should I use for transforming large lists?

```python
# List comprehension
result1 = [x * 2 for x in large_list]

# Using map()
result2 = list(map(lambda x: x * 2, large_list))
```

Is there a significant performance difference?

Git merge vs rebase - when to use which?
body:
I'm confused about when to use git merge vs git rebase. I understand the basic difference but I'm not sure about the practical implications.

When should I use merge and when should I use rebase? What are the pros and cons of each approach?
